title: Self-constructing a lattice-oxygen-stabilized interface in Li-rich cathodes to enable high-energy all-solid-state batteries
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE00938J, Paper
Xiangqun Xu, Shiyong Chu, Sheng Xu, Shaohua Guo, Haoshen Zhou
Employing lithium-rich oxides as cathode materials offers an ideal option for achieving high-energy all-solid-state lithium batteries (ASSLBs), while lithium-rich cathode materials are usually hard to directly match with solid-state electrolytes...
